title: What 3 sentences completely describe you? No 4th sentence save these 3. - Quora

response.answer_text: i wanna be a good person who does not do bad things not only for others but also for myself. (i have to confess, sometimes it is very hard to do it, but i try generally and sometimes i have to pretend.)i wanna be equal with the whole persons all over the world. i do not wanna get more or best things. i just wanna live with whole persons equally.i do not believe the religions. this is totally ridiculous. (because if a religion wants to torture, it does not fit with me. i am sorry.)

1.). I’m loyal to the ones I love most. I keep my circle small but give it my all. 2.). I have a deep sadness that I hide behind a happy demeanor. I lost my best friend, mentor, my mom tragically and the grief is damn near unbearable. 3.). I find humor in simple things. I love to joke, clown and consider myself a fun loving comedian!
